item.title: Moon 32K topography virtual texture
item.description: We’d like to announce that we just published a new virtual texture dataset. This dataset is based on NASA’s Scientific Visualization Studio CGI Moon Kit. Constructed from the DEM (Digital Elevation Map) in LRO/LOLA, it contains a 32K virtual texture for the Moon topography (elevation). When you have tessellation activated, this represents elevation in the Moon by vertex displacement and subdivision.
